str2: Of Chaldee origin; son of Nabas; Barnabas, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To will, intend, desire, wish. Middle voice of a primary verb; to 'will, ' i.e. be willing.
To take along as a companion. From sun and paralambano; to take along in company.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name. Akin to the base of keleuo; to 'call'.
Of Latin origin; Marcus, a Christian.
